bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Amendment Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks
Part 16: Air Interface for Broadband Wireless Access Systems -- Advanced Air Interface
IEEE Draft Amendment Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Part 16: Air Interface for Broadband Wireless Access Systems -- Advanced Air Interface

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard amends the IEEE 802.16 WirelessMAN-OFDMA specification to provide an advanced air interface for operation in licensed bands. It meets the cellular layer requirements of IMT-Advanced next generation mobile networks. This amendment provides continuing support for legacy WirelessMAN-OFDMA equipment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
